BlackStorm:

"I'm in a mission"replied BlackStorm who typed a encoded 
message"those are my coordinates where you can join us... If it's 
about what we have been chatting, join us, and we can find the way 
to be alone"




--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "raccoon7679" <logomorph@h...> wrote:
> Battera::
> 
> She lay covered under the debree.  She felt the pain in her body, 
> then, with a flash of thought, she felt her systems shut down. Her 
> signal was now off and her optics dark. Her internal clock started 
> it's countdown.
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Rudra656@a... wrote:
> > ::Hevn::
> >        "What the blazes...?"  He shakes his head again.  "I 
missed 
> on 
> > purpose, and what does she do, fly into the shots.  By the pit 
she 
> is an odd one, oh 
> > well.  So it goes."  He looks around and realizes he's lost 
track 
> of 
> > Blackstorm in the commotion.  He sends a brief message to 
> her.  "Hello Blackstorm, 
> > could you do me a favor and send me your coordinates, I have a 
> brief message to 
> > relay to you that is best delivered in person."
